How many people are affected by auriculo-condylar syndrome ?,Auriculo-condylar syndrome appears to be a rare disorder. More than two dozen affected individuals have been described in the medical literature.,GHR,auriculo-condylar syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to auriculo-condylar syndrome ?,"Auriculo-condylar syndrome can be caused by mutations in either the GNAI3 or PLCB4 gene. These genes provide
